p: In the multivariate model, only baseline hemoglobin levels were significantly associated with incident TB [adjusted HR 6.88 (95% CI: 1.78–26.58) p = 0.01; Table 3]. We also found a significant interaction between gender and BMI [adjusted HR 0.61 (95% CI: 0.38–0.96) p = 0.03] (data not shown). However, there was no interaction between gender and hemoglobin level [adjusted HR 1.08 (95% CI 0.96–1.22) p = 0.19] (data not shown).
